main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in Northern California on August 3, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately 50 feet in diameter, circular in shape, and metallic in appearance., Multiple witnesses observed the object, including a USAF officer and local resident., The object was reported to be hovering at an altitude of 500 to 1000 feet., No lights or sounds were associated with the object during the observations., It suddenly accelerated and disappeared after remaining stationary for most of the observation time.
witness description: Mr. Thomas P. Anderson (USAF), Mrs. Jane Doe (local resident), Mr. John Smith (USAF officer)
